data.text: @biggsintweets When are these peeps going to learn to stop filming themselves doing the bad things?
@biggsintweets IKR, those people have no idea whatsoever about te ao Maori and im infuriated more than i have been at any point in the past few weeks by whats happened here by entitled pakeha.
@biggsintweets Shit that passes me off watching that
@alwaysheapstodo Honestly “We emailed and nobody replied so we showed up anyway” is dumb, entitlement bullshit in any culture. Only difference here is the Iwi were massively respectful.

@biggsintweets Showing NZ is racist AF still.

The caucasity of that woman using kupu maori whilst saying what she says about te iwi.
@biggsintweets What a fine specimen of excrement she is. 💩
@biggsintweets pretty disgusting. These people are not covering themselves in glory... they wonder why no one wants them on their land.... Hmmmm
@Jasontripletdad Gutter shit, man. Everyone knows who they are, this stuff just confirms it and they’re willingly filming it.

@biggsintweets But only hide it and not for long..
Trash

@JamesW228 The one before is your classic gaslighting-into-mask-off-racism stuff, then everyone turns their back on a Haka, so naturally, feeling safe around other racists, Granny makes a face and pokes her tongue out.
